tool_description: Converts your Mojang Minecraft username into a UUID.
name: Minecraft UUID Converter
title: Minecraft UUID Converter

api_list.name: UUID to Name
api_list.description: Convert your Mineccraft UUID to a Name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://minecraft-uuid-converter.p.rapidapi.com/uuid/069a79f444e94726a5befca90e38aaf5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minecraft-uuid-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://minecraft-uuid-converter.p.rapidapi.com/uuid/{uuid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minecraft-uuid-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
